sentence.Network_en: She behaves frivolously, she is not at all sedate.
sentence.Network_cn: 她举止飘浮, 很不稳重.

sentence.Network_en: She spends her time frivolously enjoying the easy life.
sentence.Network_cn: 她玩世不恭地消磨时间,享受著轻松的生活.

sentence.Network_en: However, if you hoard money selfishly or spend it frivolously, you will never have enough.
sentence.Network_cn: 相反, 如果你自私地把钱藏起来或者用在愚蠢的地方, 会永远觉得钱不够多.
